divs: sighting detailswatching from patio, looking at moon, no real reason..just havin a smoke on my patio. looking south and up. object high, 4 red lights two ad back as if on ends of a tringle, two near front\center of a triagle shape. observed other planes in the area at same time, all with white lights, red lights, strobes, normal airplane config. some very near and low, some far away and high...all normal with strobes... what i saw had zero strobes at all...none. i watched it pass eastward, and lost sight, went out front door, to get a better view of eastern sky, lost it....should have been able to pick it back up, but gone.
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Arlington
There were no other sightings in Arlington on or around November 18th 2010
Summary: High, dull red lights, no strobes at all.
